21 #include "embaseobject.h"

23 #include <string>

25 namespace easemob {
26 
27 class EASEMOB_API EMError : EMBaseObject
28 {
29 public:
30 
31  typedef enum
32  {
33  EM_NO_ERROR = 0, //No error
34 
35  GENERAL_ERROR, //General error
36  NETWORK_ERROR, //Network isn't avaliable
37 
38  INVALID_APP_KEY = 100, //App key is invalid
39  INVALID_USER_NAME, //User name is illegal
40  INVALID_PASSWORD, //Password is illegal
41  INVALID_URL, //URL is invalid
42 
43  USER_ALREADY_LOGIN = 200, //User has already login
44  USER_NOT_LOGIN, //User has not login
45  USER_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED, //User name or password is wrong
46  USER_ALREADY_EXIST, //User has already exist
47  USER_NOT_FOUND, //User dosn't exist
48  USER_ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT, //Illegal argument
49  USER_LOGIN_ANOTHER_DEVICE, //User login on another device
50  USER_REMOVED, //User was removed from server
51  USER_REG_FAILED, //User register failed
52  PUSH_UPDATECONFIGS_FAILED, //Update push configs failed
53 
54  SERVER_NOT_REACHABLE = 300, //Server is not reachable
55  SERVER_TIMEOUT, //Wait server response timeout
56  SERVER_BUSY, //Server is busy
57  SERVER_UNKNOWN_ERROR, //Unknown server error
58  SERVER_GET_DNSLIST_FAILED, //Can't get dns list
59 
60  FILE_NOT_FOUND = 400, //File isn't exist
61  FILE_INVALID, //File is invalid
62  FILE_UPLOAD_FAILED, //Failed uploading file to server
63  FILE_DOWNLOAD_FAILED, //Failed donwloading file from server
64 
65  MESSAGE_INVALID = 500, //Message is invalid
66  MESSAGE_INCLUDE_ILLEGAL_CONTENT, //Message include illegal content
67  MESSAGE_SEND_TRAFFIC_LIMIT,
68  MESSAGE_ENCRYPTION_ERROR,
69 
70  GROUP_INVALID_ID = 600, //Group id is invalid
71  GROUP_ALREADY_JOINED, //User has already joined the group
72  GROUP_NOT_JOINED, //User has not joined the group
73  GROUP_PERMISSION_DENIED, //User has no right for this operation
74  GROUP_MEMBERS_FULL, //Group members is full
75  GROUP_NOT_EXIST, //Group is not exist
76 
77  CHATROOM_INVALID_ID = 700, //Chatroom id is invalid
78  CHATROOM_ALREADY_JOINED, //User has already joined the chatroom
79  CHATROOM_NOT_JOINED, //User has not joined the chatroom
80  CHATROOM_PERMISSION_DENIED, //User has no right for this operation
81  CHATROOM_MEMBERS_FULL, //Chatroom members is full
82  CHATROOM_NOT_EXIST, //Chatroom is not exist
83 
84  CALL_INVALID_ID = 800, //Call id is invalid
85  CALL_BUSY, //Call in progress
86  CALL_REMOTE_OFFLINE, //remote offline
87  CALL_CONNECTION_FAILED, //Establish connection failed
88  }EMErrorCode;
89 
98  EMError(int errorCode = EM_NO_ERROR, const std::string &description = "");
99  void setErrorCode(int errorCode, const std::string &description = "");
100  virtual ~EMError() {}
101 
102  int mErrorCode;
103  std::string mDescription;
104 };
105 
106 typedef std::shared_ptr<EMError> EMErrorPtr;
107 
108 }
